content: विस्फूर्जथुः {@--1@} Roaring, thundering, rumbling. {@--2@} A clap or peal of thunder. {@--3@} (Hence) A thunderlike manifestation or rise, any sudden appearance or stroke; ममैव जन्मांतरपातकानां विपाकविस्फूर्जथुरप्रसह्यः <ls>R. 14. 62.</ls> {@--4@} Rolling (as of waves); swell, surging appearance; महोर्मिविस्फूर्जथुनिर्विशेषाः <ls>R. 13. 12.</ls>
